thought: To craft a yellow_stained_glass_pane, I need to craft yellow_dye and glass_pane first. Yellow_dye can be crafted using a sunflower, which is in slot 10. Therefore, I will move the sunflower from slot 10 to the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 10 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
